row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 6)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 10)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
row_desc: Queen has one lip sync win.
Queen has at least two lip sync wins.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
